title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 6.2 - Milk receiver's license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 6.2 - Milk receiver's license

State Regulations

Pursuant to Agriculture and Markets Law, section 57, no
person shall measure, weigh or otherwise determine the volume or weight of
milk, or shall sample milk when such samples are to be tested to determine the
amount of component or components therein, where the result of such test is
used as a basis for payment for such milk or for the purpose of official
inspection or for public record, unless licensed by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
